rows.label: qst702501_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone, stay calm! Children,
stay with the adults.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0005
rows.name:
It's terrible! Monsters are
attacking from the port!

rows.label: qst702501_msg0006
rows.name: Three of them. Not many, but...

rows.label: qst702501_msg0007
rows.name:
That's what worries me. Too
few to attack a settlement.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0008
rows.name: They might be splitting their forces.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0011
rows.name:
Well, most of them are
out on a mission...

rows.label: qst702501_msg0012
rows.name:
Then I'd like the available
hands to guide everyone.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0014
rows.name: Um! Can I continue my watch here?

rows.label: qst702501_msg0015
rows.name: I want to be of service.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0016
rows.name: Alright. But promise me one thing.

rows.label: qst702501_msg0017
rows.name:
If you think things are getting
bad, run immediately. Understood?

rows.label: qst702501_msg0019
rows.name: Good answer. See you later, then!
